about_the_game:
Welcome to Club Defenders, the ultimate fusion of music, tower defense strategy, and action! In this electrifying multiplayer co-op experience, the stakes are higher than just some action - our music is under attack!

The Xilenz despises music and the joy it brings to humanity. They can't stand the fact that we celebrate life and gain power through rhythm and melodies. Enraged by our love for music, the Xilenz have invaded Earth with a sinister goal - to steal our music and silence our world forever.

But we're not going down without a fight. As a Club Defender, it's up to you and your crew to protect the heart of our culture - the music, and the clubs where the music never stops. Arm yourselves with powerful music-based towers, sound weapons and music instruments, sync up with your team and unleash the power of your favourite music to fend off the alien invaders. Every club brings a new experince, a new challenge, and a chance to prove that music is the ultimate weapon.

Do you have what it takes to keep the dance floor alive? Join us at TeeDee corp. and show the Xilenz that the power of music will never be silenced in Club Defenders!
detailed_description:
Welcome to Club Defenders, the ultimate fusion of music, tower defense strategy, and action! In this electrifying multiplayer co-op experience, the stakes are higher than just some action - our music is under attack!

The Xilenz despises music and the joy it brings to humanity. They can't stand the fact that we celebrate life and gain power through rhythm and melodies. Enraged by our love for music, the Xilenz have invaded Earth with a sinister goal - to steal our music and silence our world forever.

But we're not going down without a fight. As a Club Defender, it's up to you and your crew to protect the heart of our culture - the music, and the clubs where the music never stops. Arm yourselves with powerful music-based towers, sound weapons and music instruments, sync up with your team and unleash the power of your favourite music to fend off the alien invaders. Every club brings a new experince, a new challenge, and a chance to prove that music is the ultimate weapon.

Do you have what it takes to keep the dance floor alive? Join us at TeeDee corp. and show the Xilenz that the power of music will never be silenced in Club Defenders!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6300t or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 480 8GB
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 480 8GB
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

name: Club Defenders

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6300t or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 480 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 480 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Club Defenders is the ultimate fusion of music, strategy, and action! It's up to you to protect our music from the Xilenz. Arm yourselves with powerful music-based towers, sound weapons and music instruments, sync up with your team and unleash the power of music to fend off the alien invaders.
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
